issue.title: [R] Read record batch and table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3505](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3505). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reading from various input streams, similar to ARROW-3490 which was for output
